meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brad Geagley Rosemary Woodlock Jeff Suto Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #495.

td.p: Brad Geagley, a writer and game designer from Los Angeles, California
Rosemary Woodlock, an attorney originally from Texas
Jeff Suto, a law student originally from Hacienda Heights, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,000)

tr.td: ANCIENT AMERICA
5-LETTER WORDS
MUSIC
MIDDLE NAMES
HERALDIC BEASTS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'These equines disappeared from N. America some 8000 years ago & were brought back by white explorers')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: These equines disappeared from N. America some 8000 years ago & were brought back by white explorers
